link.title: Example Waveforms
link.description: Explore example waveforms comparing FlexRay, CAN / CAN FD, and LIN buses, including dynamic frames, fault-tolerant signals, and protocol decoding views.
keywords: CAN FD waveform, FlexRay frame decode, LIN bus decoding, CAN FD utilization, dynamic frame waveform, fault tolerant CAN, FlexRay vs CAN waveform
